title: Hour 2 - Bob Costas
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Bob Costas
description:
Dan Patrick is joined by legendary announcer Bob Costas to talk about the MLB playoffs and his thoughts on Aaron Judge hitting 62 home runs and what it means in baseball history.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
